channel.title: Run.cmd to run.sh
channel.description: This is for linux, if you know another way to run server on linux vps, please help me. That is my run.sh now [code]java -Xmx512m -cp bin:lib/* com.rs.Launcher true true false[/code] This is the error i get. [CODE]reException in thread "main" java.lang.ClassFormatError: com.rs.Launcher (unrecognized class file version) at java.lang.VMClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.10) at gnu.gcj.runtime.SystemClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.10) at gnu.java.lang.MainThread.run(libgcj.so.10) [/CODE] And this is the original launcher, if anyone could help. Much appreciated. [CODE]@echo off title Collision 719 echo Lauching Collision at %TIME%, %DATE% "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/CODE] Thats regular run.cmd

item.title: Run.cmd to run.sh
item.dc:creator: @Lennon Lennon
item.description:
@Lennon wrote:

So i have to compile with new version of java to work?
Theres compiler.

@echo off title FuryPkz Compiler echo Compiling collision 704 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause
Would i do java -d bin -cp lib/* -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java then then just use rest of files?

Read full topic

item.title: Run.cmd to run.sh
item.dc:creator: @Lennon Lennon
item.description:
@Lennon wrote:

This is for linux, if you know another way to run server on linux vps, please help me.
That is my run.sh now

This is the error i get.

reException in thread "main" java.lang.ClassFormatError: com.rs.Launcher (unrecognized class file version) at java.lang.VMClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.10) at gnu.gcj.runtime.SystemClassLoader.findClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.10) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(libgcj.so.10) at gnu.java.lang.MainThread.run(libgcj.so.10)
And this is the original launcher, if anyone could help. Much appreciated.

@echo off title Collision 719 echo Lauching Collision at %TIME%, %DATE% "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause
Thats regular run.cmd

Read full topic
